en.title: FE Launches Scalar Energized RVT!
en.content:
FusionExcel launched its latest product, Scalar Energized RVT (Resveratrol) at PGRM Hall, Cheras, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on 24th November 2008. The launch was a GREAT SUCCESS attended by 500 of FusionExcel's invited top leaders. FusionExcel's Medical Consultants, Dr Siva M.D. and Dr Amir Farid M.D. did presentations on "Causes of Aging" and "Solutions to Aging" to the enthusiastic crowd. RVT is an amazing product, which can help extend life in many ways. It was featured in Fortune magazine in 2007. At the event, Dr Siva also launched his latest book titled "Resveratrol (RVT) - The Anti-Aging Solution". FusionExcel recommends all FusionExcel's leaders to get a copy and read more about this amazing product.

FusionExcel's Founder Director, KS Lee, gave a motivational speech on Network Marketing to the audience. To achieve success in Network Marketing, the KEY is to build networks, NOT to do SELLING. The other KEY is to SERVICE your network well.

Presidential Director KC Phoon performed a demonstration on a volunteer from the audience with the RVT spray. Just like with FusionExcel's Quantum Pendant, there was marked improvement in the volunteer's balance, strength and stability! KC pointed out that FusionExcel's scalar energized RVT, being a consumable product provides REPEAT sales every month. What this means is that all FusionExcel Leaders now have the opportunity to MULTIPLY their income every month! Imagine your down-lines buying RVT every month, imagine how much more income you can make! So go for it and SEE YOU AT THE TOP!
>> Click Here For More Details on RVT
